0000000_01100_00000_000_00001_0010011 //R1 + 1 -> R1
0000000_00001_00000_000_00100_1100011 //beq R0, R1
0000111_11111_00011_000_00011_0010011 //R3 + 15 -> R3
0000000_00100_00100_000_00100_0010011 //R4 + 4 -> R4
0000000_00001_00001_000_00010_0110011 //R1 + R1 -> R2
0100000_00001_00001_000_00010_0110011 //R1 - R1 -> R2
